price: 129 C’est ainsi que, pour prix de leurs péchés, Nous mettons certains impies sous le pouvoir de leurs semblables.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
